text: Ecyrus dasycerus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Say in 1827.BioLib.cz - Ecyrus dasycerus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==Subspecies== * Ecyrus dasycerus dasycerus (Say, 1827) * Ecyrus dasycerus floridanus Linsley, 1935 ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1827
title: Ecyrus dasycerus
